provenance:
Moisei Zaks, United States (by 1956–1991) [1]; his nephew, Leonid Zaks and Elena Zaks, Ramat Gan, Israel (1991–2007; consigned to Robert Hiedemann Fine Art, Richmond, Virginia, sold to Mia)

[1] Zaks reportedly acquired the painting in the Soviet Union and granted permission to export his paintings collection in Moscow in December 1956 to January 1957 when he traveled to Belarus
